EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_iOS8.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: iOS 8 Cheat Sheet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for your interest in the iOS 8 Cheat Sheet <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/iOS-8-Cheat-Sheet-Pivotal-Labs1.pdf> by Pivotal Labs. We hope you find this report useful and informative.
You can download the report here. <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/iOS-8-Cheat-Sheet-Pivotal-Labs1.pdf>
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or Contact Us <pivotallabs.com/contact> on our website.
Regards, The Pivotal Labs team
